name: Cyberpunked
description:
Cyberpunked is a standard 2D platformer set in a dystopian city where you play as a slick hacker dude. The idea Cyberpunked  came from me working on a project in a Game Design class. I set out to make a cyberpunk themed game and used the title that I previously made in a different project. I managed to make about 95% of the assets present in the final build.

Credit to code from Michael Baker. 

Credit for Assets:

Pixel Space Platform Pack- Aiden Art https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/42637

Cyberpunk Street Environment and Warped City Asset Pack- Ansimuz https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/18720

Apartment Background- Nathan Hamley https://www.artstation.com/artwork/dOgaX3
